channel.title: Storkpk
channel.description:
Hi guys,
Does anyone have the storkpk source and client? I searched the website and google, but could not find it. If it isn't released, can you guys recommend any other sources that use the point system? (Like the one in "imk0tter's" server)
Thanks.
[size=20pt][size=10pt][font=Verdana][b]DOES ANYONE KNOW A POINT SYSTEM SERVER WITH FORUMS WHERE YOU GET POINTS FOR TRAINING AND USE THEM ON SKILLS IN THE FORUMS?[/b][/font][/size][/size]

item.title: Storkpk
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“Berk, post:14, topic:267879”]Could you stop flaming on my thread pesterd? Leave if you must.

P.S. I specifically explained what i meant with point system and he told me havokonline had it.[/quote]

Sorry about the flaming but the 15 year old kid thinks he knows more because he has been here for a longer time period than me

[quote=“lolwat22, post:15, topic:267879”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=353644.msg2711640#msg2711640 date=1237338439]
once again my point has been proven. Out of all that I just stated the only thing that you can defend yourself on or even attempt to defend yourself on is the fact that 15 is or is not a child.
Your maturity level is much lower than mine and I dont wish to argue with you when you cant defend.

Off the record: Im 19 in a few days.
[/quote]I’m more mature than you are, ask anyone that isn’t a newfag on these forums in this section.[/quote]

Newfag? Dictionary reference please and make sure to use proper grammar, because of course, you know more than I.

Read full topic

item.title: Storkpk
item.dc:creator: @lolwat22 lolwat22
item.description:
@lolwat22 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:5, topic:267879”]o well I heard storks source was released when tewl stole it but i never saw it or believed it[/quote]No, it wasn’t released. I tried pming stork on irc, but he’s afk. I can give you proof that it didn’t get released to ANYONE if you want. Heres an old log:
16:16 lolwutimnottellingmyircname: did you ever release storkpk btw?
16:16 lolwutimnottellingmyircname: the one before it got shut down?
16:16 stork: nah

If you don’t believe me, go on securitychat’s irc and ask him yourself.

Read full topic
